backend/main.mo: Main actor module providing storage, access control, authentication audit logging, and EPIQ wallet data structures and state management.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module mapping old actor state types to new ones with a direct passthrough conversion function.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/EPIQ_LIFE_UI_STYLE_GUIDE.md: Design style guide defining colors, typography, layout rules, and accessibility requirements for the EPIQ Life UI.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React application root and main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring query client, theming, authentication flow, initialization logic, and routing to landing, setup, or dashboard pages.
frontend/src/components/AdminTab.tsx: Provides an admin interface with tabs for managing users, courses, display name history, and testing tools, including user search, member-type editing, and Firebase user import.
frontend/src/components/AuthMethodSelect: Renders options for selecting Internet Identity or Firebase-based authentication, including UI cards and a Firebase login dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistAnalyze: Generates a user progress checklist based on profile, quests, wallet setup, and community actions, displaying completion status and overall progress.
frontend/src/components/CourseManagement: Implements course management tools for creating, editing, and previewing courses and modules, including quiz question editing and member-type access controls.
frontend/src/components/DisplayNameHisto: Displays display-name change history with search filters for all records, by principal, or by display name, rendering results in a sortable table.
frontend/src/components/EmojiPicker.tsx: Emoji picker with categorized tabs, search, and popover UI for selecting emojis.
frontend/src/components/EpcRewardsDialog: Dialog showing a user's EPC rewards and module completion history, pulling data from multiple queries.
frontend/src/components/EpiqIdAuthDialog: Empty placeholder component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/EpiqWalletsPanel: Wallet management panel allowing users to create wallets, view existing ones, and handle credentials securely.
frontend/src/components/FirebaseAuthDial: Authentication dialog handling Firebase login, session tracking, and optional user data sync.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with theme toggle, authentication controls, profile menu, and branding.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full‑screen loading/error screen with retry logic, progress indicator, and staged states.
frontend/src/components/MessagingTab.tsx: Messaging UI enabling user lookup, message threads, sending messages, retries, and emoji input.
frontend/src/components/ModuleContentDia: Dialog for completing quest modules with step navigation, quizzes, progress tracking, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/components/Phase1TestingPla: Static component displaying the testing checklist for authentication, data consistency, and session validation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSettingsD: Dialog allowing users to edit their display name while viewing read‑only profile fields and saving updates.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Initial profile setup flow collecting name, display name, email, and member type before saving the profile.
frontend/src/components/QuestTab.tsx: Renders quests by combining course modules with user progress, handles backend readiness, retries, and progress updates.
frontend/src/components/SecurityAuditLog: Displays authentication audit logs with filtering, exporting, and session‑cleanup actions.
frontend/src/components/UserProgressDial: Shows a user's quest and course progress in a dialog with tabs and detailed completion status.
frontend/src/components/WalletTab.tsx: Provides a wallet interface for viewing transactions, sending funds, and auto‑retrying backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains the backend actor tied to identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirebaseAuth.tsx: Implements Firebase‑based authentication, user‑data sync, session checks, and status tracking using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors, fetching and mutating user profiles, admin checks, transactions, rewards, and progress data with timeout handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard_REFERENCE.t: Deprecated reference version of the dashboard using tabbed navigation, kept only for design reference.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements a tabbed dashboard UI showing user profile, rewards, progress, courses, and admin access using multiple backend query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Implements a routed dashboard page that displays personalized stats, wallet info, course progress, and navigation shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/GovernanceDashboard.t: Admin-only dashboard that loads users, courses, and progress to compute stats and navigate to sections.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with hero content and authentication selection for onboarding.
Handles multi-stage app initialization, including auth, backend actor setup, profile loading, and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form allowing users to enter personal info and save a new profile.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current architecture, wallet-handling rules, existing implemented features, and pending feature requests for the EPIQ Life platform. Emphasizes strict on-chain balance authority, user‑initiated wallet creation, and separation between Life and Treasury key management.
